name: Ship Happens (Stikkz)
description:
***GO TO FULL SCREEN MODE ***

Sail the seven seas keeping your ship afloat to earn your living. The longer the trip and the more cargo you carry = more money.

Using Keyboard & Mouse OR Game Controller

Choose your captain.

Choose your vessel = Amount of cargo you can carry

Choose your destination = Length of trip

Operate the ships controls to survive (press pause to see the controls in game)

Pet the cat = Wiggle the right stick or hover the mose over the cat with the left mouse button down and wiggle.

Pump out the water = top shoulder buttons or Q & P alternating

Steer = Trigger buttons or mouse wheel.

Extinguish fire = Down on D pad or Enter.

Ships horn = Left on D pad or space bar

Radio = Change the channel using A,B,X and Y or Z,X,C and V.

Radar = left stick or arrow keys to move the red marker to the red ship.

Credits = Game name by PSG

This game was made over 8 days for Game Jam 192 episode: 2.
